ai-patthana18.29:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.29:0.3_0: He should see his residue of seeing (but) and weapons, etc.
ai-patthana18.29:1.1_0: Gathering should be given up by seeing, not seeing, inclining, you should give up causes and reasons.
ai-patthana18.29:1.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana18.29:2.1_0: Without seeing the principles, without seeing, you should give up without seeing a cause or condition.
ai-patthana18.29:2.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana18.29:3.1_0: Without a reason, no cause or reason,
ai-patthana18.29:4.1_0: ‘This is the supreme cause, this is the reason why the teaching doesn’t give rise to the supreme cause.’
ai-patthana18.29:5.1_0: And the same answers to the same.
ai-patthana18.29:6.1_0: The field of the teachings is finished.
ai-patthana18.29:7.1_0: The successive permutation series on the bowl is finished.
